CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 27, reads: "In Title Game Saturday - Westinghouse High School's classy basketball team will be favored to repeat as city cage champions at the Pitt Field House Saturday against South Hills. Expected to see the majority of the action for the Bulldogs in title game are, left to right, standing Gerald Hawkins, Royo Giddens, Allison Phillips and Collus Smith.  Kneeling: Bradford, Jim McClellan, Tony Aullicianio and Coach Fisher.  Phillips and Giddens are the Bulldogs chief scorers. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Westinghouse basketball players, standing left to right: Gerald Hawkins,  #19 Roosevelt "Royo" Giddens, Allison Phillips, and #8 Collus Smith with hands on knees; kneeling: Bradford, #3 Jim McClellan, #18 Tony Aullicianio, and Coach Willard Fisher kneeling on right, posed in interior before 1954 title game
